<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/docservice"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Checks the document service location.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"docServiceUrl":{"description":"The address of Document Server","type":"string"},"docServiceUrlInternal":{"description":"The address of Document Server in the local private network","type":"string"},"docServiceUrlPortal":{"description":"The address of Community Server","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Document service information","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
